sample.title: XMLTree
sample.author: Oh, Soo-Young.
sample.description: This XMLTree application was created using the MFC AppWizard. This application uses the IE5 XML Document Object Model to parse and display XML documents in a tree-style view.

file.name: XMLTree.dsp
file.contains: VC6 project file which contains information used to build a single project or subproject. Other users can share the project (.dsp) file, but they should export the makefiles locally.

file.name: XMLTree.h
file.contains: Main project specific includes (including Resource.h) and declaration of the CXMLTreeApp application class.

file.name: XMLTree.cpp
file.contains: The source for the main application class CXMLTreeApp.

file.name: XMLTree.rc
file.contains: All of the Microsoft Windows resources that the program uses. It includes the icons, bitmaps, and cursors that are stored in the RES subdirectory.

file.name: XMLTree.clw
file.contains: Information used by ClassWizard to edit existing classes or add new classes. ClassWizard also uses this file to store information needed to create and edit message maps and dialog data maps and to create prototype member functions.

file.name: res\XMLTree.ico
file.contains: The application's icon. This icon is included by the main resource file XMLTree.rc.

file.name: res\XMLTree.rc2
file.contains: Resources that are not edited by Microsoft Visual C++.

wizlist.description: The following files were generated by the Visual Studio AppWizard

file.name: XMLTreeDlg.h, XMLTreeDlg.cpp - the dialog
file.contains: The source for the CXMLTreeDlg class which is the application's main dialog. The dialog's template is in XMLTree.rc, which can be edited in Microsoft Visual C++.

file.name: StdAfx.h, StdAfx.cpp
file.contains: These files are used to build a precompiled header (PCH) file named XMLTree.pch and a precompiled types file named StdAfx.obj.

file.name: Resource.h
file.contains: This is the standard header file, which defines new resource IDs. Microsoft Visual C++ reads and updates this file.
